testSteps.description: (/products-and-docs/widgets/) Verification for all the page's links #1: {elementKey=Checkout Widget Button, pageURL={url}/products-and-docs/widgets/checkout/, pageTitle=//h1, regression-widgets=}

children.description: Given open Widgets page
Open page
When check visibility and click {Checkout Widget Button} element of Widgets page
Then check that new page opened from Widgets page has {{url}/products-and-docs/widgets/checkout/} and {//h1}

As a test engineer
I want to test Ticket Master Developer's site
So that I test Widgets Page of Ticket Master Developer's site
